    Merging MDP

    Merging MDP

    AutonomousMerging.MergingMDP — Type.
    MergingMDP <: MDP{MergingState, Int64}

    A discrete state and action MDP representing a merging scenario with only two agents: the ego vehicle on the merge lane and another traffic participant on the main lane.
